SOL.name: Solana
SOL.description: High-performance L1 blockchain using Proof of History for sub-second finality. 65K TPS theoretical, 1-4K actual.
SOL.founders: Anatoly Yakovenko (Ukrainian-American, ex-Qualcomm 12yrs, UIUC CS), Raj Gokal (Northwestern, ex-Omada Health)
SOL.tech: L1, PoS+PoH, Sealevel VM, Rust, parallel execution, 400ms blocks, NOT EVM compatible
SOL.tokenomics: 587M total, 470M circulating, 4.1% inflation (floor 1.5%), 50% fee burn, stakeable
SOL.tags: layer1 high-tps pos rust parallel-execution memecoins nft defi gaming payments

ETH.name: Ethereum
ETH.description: Leading smart contract platform. Foundation for DeFi, NFTs, DAOs. PoS since The Merge (Sept 2022).
ETH.founders: Vitalik Buterin (Russian-Canadian, University of Waterloo dropout), Gavin Wood (UK, PhD York, created Solidity), Charles Hoskinson (USA, now Cardano), Joseph Lubin (USA, Princeton, Goldman Sachs, founded ConsenSys)
ETH.tech: L1, PoS (Casper), EVM, Solidity/Vyper, 15-30 TPS, 12s blocks, most developers
ETH.tokenomics: Unlimited supply, EIP-1559 fee burns (3M+ ETH burned), deflationary during high usage
ETH.tags: layer1 smart-contracts evm solidity defi nft dao web3 most-adopted

AXS.name: Axie Infinity
AXS.description: Pioneer play-to-earn game. Collect, breed, battle NFT creatures. Built on Ronin sidechain.
AXS.hq: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam (legal: Singapore)
AXS.founders: Trung Nguyen (Vietnamese, FPT University, ICPC competitor, founded Lozi food app at 20), Aleksander Larsen (Norwegian, esports), Jeff Zirlin (American), Tu Doan (Vietnamese), Viet Anh Ho (Vietnamese)
AXS.tech: Ronin sidechain (Ethereum), NFT-based, dual token (AXS governance + SLP rewards)
AXS.tags: gaming play-to-earn nft breeding battler pokemon-style vietnam asia

POL.name: Polygon
POL.description: Ethereum L2 scaling. PoS chain + zkEVM + CDK for app-chains. Transitioned from MATIC.
POL.founders: Sandeep Nailwal (Indian, Delhi slums origin, NITIE MBA, ex-Deloitte, ex-Welspun), Jaynti Kanani (Indian, poor family, father diamond miner, DDU engineering, ex-Housing.com data scientist), Anurag Arjun (Indian), Mihailo Bjelic (Serbian)
POL.tech: L2, zkEVM (zkSNARK), PoS chain, EVM compatible, CDK for custom chains, AggLayer
POL.tokenomics: Transitioned MATIC to POL, used for gas/staking/governance
POL.tags: layer2 ethereum zk-rollup zksnark evm-compatible india gaming enterprise

AVAX.name: Avalanche
AVAX.description: L1 with 3-chain architecture (X/C/P chains) and custom subnets. Sub-second finality.
AVAX.founders: Emin GÃ¼n Sirer (Turkish-American, Princeton BS, UW PhD, Cornell professor, Bell Labs, invented Karma currency 2003), Kevin Sekniqi (Cornell PhD student), Ted Yin (Cornell PhD student)
AVAX.tech: L1, Avalanche consensus (probabilistic), C-chain EVM compatible, subnets for custom VMs, 4500 TPS, <1s finality
AVAX.tokenomics: 720M max, fee burns (deflationary), 2000 AVAX min stake
AVAX.tags: layer1 subnets evm-compatible high-tps academic cornell turkish-founder

APT.name: Aptos
APT.description: L1 from ex-Meta Diem team. Move language, Block-STM parallel execution, 160K TPS.
APT.founders: Mo Shaikh (scaling specialist, ex-VC/PE), Avery Ching (ex-Meta Diem engineer)
APT.tech: L1, AptosBFT consensus, Move VM, parallel execution (Block-STM), NOT EVM compatible, 160K TPS theoretical
APT.tokenomics: 1B initial supply, 51% community, 19% contributors, 16.5% foundation, 13.5% investors, 4yr lockup
APT.funding: $350M+ from a16z, FTX Ventures, Jump Crypto, Binance Labs
APT.tags: layer1 move-vm parallel-execution high-tps meta-diem silicon-valley

SUI.name: Sui
SUI.description: L1 from ex-Meta team. Sui Move language, object-centric model, parallel execution.
SUI.founders: Sam Blackshear (created Move language), Evan Cheng, George Danezis, Kostas Chalkias, Adeniyi Abiodun - all ex-Meta Diem engineers
SUI.tech: L1, Narwhal+Bullshark consensus (DAG), Sui Move VM, object-centric data model, parallel execution, NOT EVM, 120K TPS
SUI.tokenomics: 10B total, 3% inflation, 33% circulating, storage fund burns
SUI.tags: layer1 move-vm object-centric parallel-execution gaming meta-diem silicon-valley

ARB.name: Arbitrum
ARB.description: Largest Ethereum L2 by TVL. Optimistic rollups with fraud proofs. Uses ETH for gas.
ARB.founders: Ed Felten (Princeton professor, Obama Deputy CTO), Steven Goldfeder (Princeton), Harry Kalodner (Princeton)
ARB.tech: L2 optimistic rollup, EVM equivalent, 7-day challenge period, inherits ETH security, 40K+ TPS
ARB.tokenomics: 10B max, 2% max inflation, ARB for governance only, ETH for gas fees
ARB.tags: layer2 optimistic-rollup evm-compatible ethereum princeton academic

AAVE.name: Aave
AAVE.description: Largest DeFi lending protocol. Supply/borrow crypto, flash loans, multi-chain.
AAVE.founders: Stani Kulechov (Finnish, law degree University of Helsinki, founded ETHLend first)
AAVE.tech: DeFi protocol on Ethereum + 7 other chains, smart contract based lending
AAVE.tags: defi lending borrowing flash-loans multi-chain finnish europe

UNI.name: Uniswap
UNI.description: Leading DEX. AMM liquidity pools, permissionless token trading. $4T+ volume since 2018.
UNI.founders: Hayden Adams (American, Stony Brook grad, ex-Siemens mechanical engineer, inspired by Vitalik's AMM concept)
UNI.tech: DEX protocol using constant product AMM (x*y=k), deployed on 15+ chains
UNI.tokenomics: 1B total, 60% community, 21.5% team, 18.5% investors, governance only
UNI.funding: Paradigm seed, $11M Series A from a16z
UNI.tags: defi dex amm liquidity swap governance

LINK.name: Chainlink
LINK.description: Industry-standard oracle network. Price feeds, VRF, automation, CCIP cross-chain.
LINK.founders: Sergey Nazarov (American, blockchain entrepreneur), Steve Ellis (CTO, engineering background)
LINK.tech: Decentralized oracle network, node operators provide off-chain data to smart contracts
LINK.tokenomics: 1B total, 35% ICO, 35% node incentives, 30% team, 4.5% staking APY
LINK.partnerships: Swift, Euroclear, Mastercard, Fidelity, UBS, ANZ
LINK.tags: oracle infrastructure data-feeds ccip cross-chain enterprise

ATOM.name: Cosmos
ATOM.description: Internet of Blockchains. IBC protocol connects 50+ chains. Hub-and-Zones model.
ATOM.founders: Jae Kwon (Cornell CS, invented Tendermint consensus), Ethan Buchman (ex-Ethereum contributor)
ATOM.tech: L0/Hub, Tendermint BFT consensus, CosmWasm smart contracts, Cosmos SDK, IBC interoperability
ATOM.tokenomics: 488M circulating, 10-14% staking rewards, no max supply
ATOM.tags: interoperability ibc cross-chain layer0 cosmos-sdk tendermint

DOT.name: Polkadot
DOT.description: L0 connecting parachains with shared security. 100 parachain slots. XCM messaging.
DOT.founders: Gavin Wood (UK, PhD York, Ethereum co-founder, created Solidity), Robert Habermeier (Thiel Fellow), Peter Czaban
DOT.tech: L0 relay chain, parachains, NPoS consensus (GRANDPA+BABE), Substrate framework, WASM, XCM cross-chain
DOT.tokenomics: 120M DOT/year inflation, 85% to stakers, 15% treasury, 11.88% staking yield
DOT.tags: interoperability layer0 parachains shared-security substrate governance

ALGO.name: Algorand
ALGO.description: L1 with Pure Proof of Stake. Founded by Turing Award winner. Carbon-negative.
ALGO.founders: Silvio Micali (Italian-American, MIT professor since 1983, 2012 Turing Award for cryptography, invented zero-knowledge proofs, Berkeley PhD)
ALGO.tech: L1, Pure PoS, 1000 TPS, <5s finality, AVM smart contracts, TEAL language
ALGO.tokenomics: 10B total, distribution ends 2030, used for fees/governance/staking
ALGO.tags: layer1 pos mit turing-award academic carbon-negative

IMX.name: Immutable
IMX.description: Ethereum L2 for NFTs/gaming. zkSTARK rollups via StarkWare. Zero gas for users.
IMX.founders: James Ferguson, Robbie Ferguson (brothers), Alex Connolly - Australian founders
IMX.tech: L2 validity rollup, zkSTARK (StarkEx), 9000 TPS, zero gas fees, NFT-optimized
IMX.games: Gods Unchained, Guild of Guardians, Illuvium, Ember Sword (680+ games total)
IMX.tags: layer2 zk-rollup zkstark nft gaming zero-gas australia

FET.name: Artificial Superintelligence Alliance
FET.description: Decentralized AI platform. Autonomous agents. Merged with SingularityNET + CUDOS.
FET.founders: Humayun Sheikh (UK, early DeepMind investor, founded itzMe AI), Toby Simpson (UK, ex-DeepMind head of software), Thomas Hain (Sheffield professor)
FET.tech: Autonomous AI agents, machine learning, multi-chain, ASI:Cloud platform
FET.tokenomics: 2.7B total, 2.3B circulating, used for AI services/governance/staking
FET.tags: ai autonomous-agents machine-learning deepmind-connection uk cambridge

RENDER.name: Render Network
RENDER.description: Decentralized GPU network for 3D rendering and AI. Connects idle GPUs with creators.
RENDER.founders: Jules Urbach (OTOY CEO since 2008, cloud graphics pioneer)
RENDER.advisors: Ari Emanuel (WME), JJ Abrams, Brendan Eich (Brave), Emad Mostaque (Stability AI), Beeple
RENDER.tech: Decentralized GPU compute, Solana-based (migrated from ETH), Burn-Mint-Equilibrium tokenomics
RENDER.tokenomics: BME model - RENDER burned for jobs, minted for node rewards

GALA.name: Gala Games
GALA.description: Blockchain gaming platform. Multiple games, GalaChain L1, node network.
GALA.founders: Eric Schiermeyer (Zynga co-founder - created Farmville, Intermix/MySpace co-founder), Michael McCarthy (20yr gaming vet, Zynga Creative Director, Interplay, Troika), Wright Thurston (crypto miner, blockchain patents)
GALA.tech: GalaChain L1, GALA as gas token, 50K Founder Nodes
GALA.tokenomics: GALA burned as gas, 20.9B tokens burned May 2023 ($660M)
GALA.tags: gaming play-to-earn nft zynga-founder gaming-veterans multi-game

SAND.name: The Sandbox
SAND.description: Voxel gaming metaverse. User-generated content. Major brand partnerships.
SAND.hq: Paris, France (owned by Animoca Brands, Hong Kong)
SAND.founders: Arthur Madrid (French, CEO, founded 2 software companies), Sebastien Borget (French, COO)
SAND.partners: Snoop Dogg, Gucci, Binance, Atari, Adidas, Warner Music
SAND.tech: Ethereum/Polygon, voxel-based, SAND + LAND dual token
SAND.tags: metaverse gaming virtual-land ugc voxel brands french animoca

MANA.name: Decentraland
MANA.description: 3D virtual world. Browser-based metaverse. User-owned land and experiences.
MANA.founders: Ari Meilich (Argentine), Esteban Ordano (Argentine) - both stepped back to advisory 2020
MANA.tech: Browser-based 3D, Ethereum/Polygon, MANA + LAND dual token
MANA.tokenomics: MANA ERC-20 for transactions, LAND ERC-721 for property
MANA.tags: metaverse virtual-world social 3d virtual-land argentina latam

ALICE.name: My Neighbor Alice
ALICE.description: Blockchain farming game. Animal Crossing style. Built on Chromia.
ALICE.tech: Chromia blockchain, farming simulation, social gaming
ALICE.tokenomics: ALICE for governance/land, 2% burn on land transactions
ALICE.tags: gaming farming metaverse social casual chromia sweden

DOGE.name: Dogecoin
DOGE.description: Original meme coin. Started as joke in 2013. Community-driven, Elon Musk association.
DOGE.founders: Billy Markus (American, IBM engineer, Portland), Jackson Palmer (Australian, Adobe marketer, Sydney) - created as joke making fun of crypto speculation
DOGE.tech: Litecoin fork, Scrypt PoW, merge-mined with Litecoin, 1min blocks
DOGE.tokenomics: Unlimited supply, ~5B DOGE/year inflation (3-4%), NO max cap
DOGE.tags: meme community payment shiba-inu elon-musk viral joke-origin

SHIB.name: Shiba Inu
SHIB.description: Meme token with ecosystem. Shibarium L2, ShibaSwap DEX, multiple tokens.
SHIB.founders: Ryoshi (pseudonymous, identity unknown) - self-proclaimed Dogecoin killer
SHIB.tech: Ethereum + Shibarium L2 (launched Aug 2023), ShibaSwap DEX
SHIB.tokenomics: 1 quadrillion initial, ~584T circulating, community burns, Shibarium fee burns, ecosystem: LEASH, BONE, TREAT
SHIB.tags: meme shibarium layer2 defi dex burn-mechanism community

PEPE.name: Pepe
PEPE.description: Deflationary frog memecoin. No utility, pure meme. Anonymous team.
PEPE.tech: Ethereum ERC-20, deflationary (burn on tx), 0% tax
PEPE.tokenomics: 420.69T total (420 meme), 93.1% liquidity, 6.9% multisig, burn mechanism
PEPE.tags: meme frog deflationary ethereum anonymous no-utility viral
